messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/11/03 2:28:19 AM Eastern Daylight Time, ... Our newest Dog is Sharon. Since she is a female I had to tell the kids it was better than
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/11/03 2:28:19 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

> Kelly actually downs her food in about 5 seconds. Ozzy is a slow eater.

Our newest Dog is Sharon. Since she is a female I had to tell the kids it was
better than naming her Ozzy. THey thought so too.
*~*Elissa Jill*~*
unschooling Momma to 3 beautiful brilliant people
Loving partner for life to Joey
terrible guitarist, fair singer and happy woman.






[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
